# Baseline JavaScript Documentation
# Feature 005 - JavaScript Externalization
# Date: 2025-11-10

This file documents the inline JavaScript that exists in templates before externalization.

## Templates with Inline JavaScript:

1. src/c2/pas/aal2/browser/templates/register_passkey.pt
   - Lines 79-219: WebAuthn registration flow
   - Functions: base64urlDecode, base64urlEncode, registration event handler
   
2. src/c2/pas/aal2/browser/templates/login_with_passkey.pt
   - Inline JS: WebAuthn login flow
   - Functions: authentication flow, base64 helpers

3. src/c2/pas/aal2/browser/templates/enhanced_login.pt
   - Inline JS: Combined login with toggle
   - Functions: showPasswordForm, showPasskeyForm, login flow

4. src/c2/pas/aal2/browser/aal2_challenge.pt
   - Inline JS: AAL2 step-up authentication
   - Functions: startAAL2Authentication, status display

5. src/c2/pas/aal2/browser/templates/manage_passkeys.pt
   - Inline JS: Passkey management UI
   - Functions: loadPasskeys, deletePasskey, editDeviceName, updateDeviceName

## Expected Result After Externalization:
- All inline JavaScript moved to external .js files in browser/static/js/
- Templates only contain initialization calls (e.g., initPasskeyRegistration())
- All WebAuthn functionality works identically
